nodes.name: WithClaimableMigrationOwnership

nodes.documentation: @dev Throws if called by any account other than the migrationOwner.
nodes.name: onlyMigrationOwner

nodes.documentation: @dev Returns true if the caller is the current migrationOwner.
nodes.name: isMigrationOwner

nodes.documentation:
@dev Leaves the contract without migrationOwner. It will not be possible to call
`onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current migrationOwner.
     * NOTE: Renouncing migrationOwnership will leave the contract without an migrationOwner,
thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the migrationOwner.
nodes.name: renounceMigrationOwnership

nodes.name: claimMigrationOwnership

devdoc.details: Extension for the Ownable contract, where the ownership needs to be claimed. This allows the new owner to accept the transfer.

claimMigrationOwnership().details: Allows the pendingMigrationOwner address to finalize the transfer.

constructor.details: Initializes the contract setting the deployer as the initial migrationMigrationOwner.

isMigrationOwner().details: Returns true if the caller is the current migrationOwner.

migrationOwner().details: Returns the address of the current migrationOwner.

renounceMigrationOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without migrationOwner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current migrationOwner.     * NOTE: Renouncing migrationOwnership will leave the contract without an migrationOwner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the migrationOwner.

transferMigrationOwnership(address).details: Allows the current migrationOwner to set the pendingOwner address.

params.newMigrationOwner: The address to transfer migrationOwnership to.

devdoc.title: Claimable
